definition: to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: BesGas Three has remained in operation for decades since.
sentences.chinese: 此後，貝斯平第三氣體精煉廠持續運轉了幾十年。

sentences.english: An intelligent ladle furnace (ILF) control system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種鋼包精煉爐智能控制系統。

sentences.english: Then he branched out into Swedish and Moroccan oil refineries.
sentences.chinese: 然後他的產業又伸展到瑞典和摩洛哥的石油精煉行業。

sentences.english: The study demonstrates that the quality of reaction accelerator can influence the density of refined copper.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，反應催化劑的質量影響精煉銅的密度。

sentences.english: By chance, he discovered BesGas Three along the way.
sentences.chinese: 他在路上意外發現了貝斯平第三氣體精煉廠。

sentences.english: Refine your keywords to answer these questions.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些問題精煉您的關鍵詞。

sentences.english: The DLF refining station can increase heat efficiency and reduce the consumption of the ladle liner materials.
sentences.chinese: DLF精煉站可提高熱效率，降低包襯材料消耗。

sentences.english: Refining companies pay more than $10 a kilogram for computer boards.
sentences.chinese: 精煉公司以每公斤10多美元的價格收購電腦線路板。

sentences.english: Present situation of the development and application of Al and alloy refine agent was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了鋁及其合金精煉劑的發展和應用現狀。

sentences.english: M oil was not only low of acid value, light of colour and lustre, but also the high rate of refining.
sentences.chinese: 所得水冬瓜油不僅酸價低，色澤淺，而且精煉率高。

sentences.english: The Paper describes the applications of Roselle and the ex tracting and re fining procedures of Roselle seed oil.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了玫瑰茄的用途，玫瑰茄籽油的製取及精煉工藝。

sentences.english: Bismuth is the by-product of lead and copper refining, as well as other metals to a smaller degree.
sentences.chinese: 鉍是鉛和銅精煉後的副產品。

sentences.english: Spend the time defining and refining the views that your customers will see.
sentences.chinese: 花點時間來定義並精煉客戶將看到的視圖。

sentences.english: It discusses how to prolong life of refinery furnace liner with ramming material.
sentences.chinese: 論述了延長精煉電爐搗打料爐襯壽命的問題。

sentences.english: The refined rice bran oil could meet the requirements of the national standard four-step.
sentences.chinese: 生產出的成品油，達到國標四級精煉米糠油要求。

definition: to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
